price: Tàbí wọ́n ń wí pé: “Ó hun ún ni.” Sọ pé: “Tí mó bá hun ún, èmi ni mo ni ẹ̀ṣẹ̀ mi. Èmi sì yọwọ́ yọsẹ̀ nínú ohun tí ẹ̀ ń dá lẹ́ṣẹ̀.”
arabic: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ ٱفۡتَرَىٰهُۖ قُلۡ إِنِ ٱفۡتَرَيۡتُهُۥ فَعَلَيَّ إِجۡرَامِي وَأَنَا۠ بَرِيٓءٞ مِّمَّا تُجۡرِمُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: am yaqūlūna if'tarāhu qul ini if'taraytuhu faʿalayya ij'rāmī wa-anā barīon mimmā tuj'rimūna
